dialog.text: Why do words feel like stones in my chest?
dialog.instructions: Accent: neutral. Emotional range: vulnerable, confused. Intonation: rising question. Speed: slow, breathy. Tone: childlike, searching.

dialog.text: Because you've been carrying them as proof of who you are.
dialog.instructions: Accent: neutral. Emotional range: calm, wise. Intonation: gentle, declarative. Speed: measured. Tone: soothing, steady.

dialog.text: Proof? I thought they were truth — the name-calling, the 'not enough.'
dialog.instructions: Accent: neutral. Emotional range: hurt, puzzled. Intonation: rising then trailing. Speed: moderate. Tone: honest, small.

dialog.text: Names are shadows of someone else's fear. You learned to bind them to yourself to survive.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft. Emotional range: empathetic, explanatory. Intonation: calm, steady. Speed: slow. Tone: warm, slightly gravelly.

dialog.text: How do I unbind them? They keep echoing—'stupid', 'worthless'—I believe them.
dialog.instructions: Accent: neutral. Emotional range: urgent, trembling. Intonation: fragmented, pleading. Speed: quickened. Tone: vulnerable.

dialog.text: Listen to the echo without fighting it. Ask: 'Who is speaking? What is it protecting?' Then thank it.
dialog.instructions: Accent: calm. Emotional range: instructive, tender. Intonation: guiding, soft. Speed: deliberate. Tone: comforting, wise.
Accent: small whisper. Emotional range: surprised, wary. Intonation: upward surprise. Speed: slow. Tone: incredulous, childlike.

dialog.text: Yes. Wounds speak as wards. Gratitude loosens the grip. You don't approve the pain — you acknowledge its intention to protect.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft. Emotional range: compassionate, clarifying. Intonation: soothing cadence. Speed: slow. Tone: warm, reassuring.

dialog.text: So the words lose their weight if I understand the fear behind them?
dialog.instructions: Accent: hopeful. Emotional range: cautious optimism. Intonation: curious, rising. Speed: moderate. Tone: tentative relief.

dialog.text: Exactly. The meaning was chosen long ago; you can choose a new one. Replace 'I'm broken' with 'I'm learning' until the muscles change.
dialog.instructions: Accent: reassuring. Emotional range: encouraging, steady. Intonation: confident, calm. Speed: measured. Tone: empowering.

dialog.text: It feels lighter already. Like the stones are sand.
dialog.instructions: Accent: soft laugh. Emotional range: relief, soft joy. Intonation: gentle, exhaling. Speed: slow. Tone: brighter, relieved.

dialog.text: Carry only what you chose. Inner work is the slow art of lightening. Speak to your shadow with curiosity, and she will teach you to be whole.
dialog.instructions: Accent: warm, resonant. Emotional range: luminous, calm. Intonation: concluding, wise. Speed: slow. Tone: radiant, peaceful.

dialog.text: I'll start—one breath, one question, one thank you.
dialog.instructions: Accent: steady. Emotional range: determined, gentle. Intonation: soft resolve. Speed: calm. Tone: hopeful, grounded.

dialog.text: Start now. Notice one word you've carried today, name the fear behind it, and offer thanks. Share what you discover in the comments—your insight may unburden someone else.
dialog.instructions: Accent: inviting. Emotional range: warm, encouraging. Intonation: friendly call-to-action. Speed: natural. Tone: inclusive, compassionate.
